extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MemoryGameDriver(MemoryGameBoard board, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      This constructor uses an internal board of Memory cards to make changes and drive the course of the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void playGame()
      This method plays an entire game of memory based on the inputs retrieved from the class constructor.
      protected void selectCard()
      This method flips a card visually, and returns the selected card internally
